text: Günter Lamprecht (born 21 January 1930 died 4 October 2022) is a German actor. He is known for his leading role in the Fassbinder miniseries Berlin Alexanderplatz (1980) and as a ship captain in the epic war movie Das Boot (1981).Gunter Lamprecht. Turner Classic Movies. title: Günter Lamprecht
